product_context.title: BESTTEN 2 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, Universal Lighting Control, Single Pole or 3 Way, Compatible with LED Dimmable Lamp, CFL, Incandescent, Halogen Bulb, Decorator Wallplate Included, UL Listed, White

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 2 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, Universal Lighting Control, Single Pole or 3 Way, Compatible with LED Dimmable Lamp, CFL, Incandescent, Halogen Bulb, Decorator Wallplate Included, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: I had a hallway with very bright lights, and the lighting sources (multi-LED discs) were mounted flat against the ceiling and looked a bit pesky to replace. So instead of getting lower-wattage discs I decided to just buy and install a dimmer switch, which was also cheaper. The installation instructions were straightforward, even for my three-way (a switch at either end of the hall) circuit. All the hookup was twist-on wire nuts. And because it came as a pair of switches (you only need one, even for a three-way circuit) I have a spare switch in case I need it elsewhere. I have just set the dimmer at the level I like and left it alone. It's just a tiny slider at the bottom of the switch paddle, and if you plan to adjust it a lot you might want to look for a different switch design.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2025
reviews.title: Went in quickly, worked perfectly

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 2 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, Universal Lighting Control, Single Pole or 3 Way, Compatible with LED Dimmable Lamp, CFL, Incandescent, Halogen Bulb, Decorator Wallplate Included, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: These seemed to be just what I wanted to replace a couple of light switches in my kitchen where bright light is great unless you want to tone it down a bit to set the mood for dinner. While these will do all that, they will not dim to off, even on a 30W incandescent bulb. That was a deal killer for me, so back they went. I ordered a GE that had a little dial allowing me to adjust exactly what the minimum setting would be, which worked out perfectly.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2025
reviews.title: WARNING: will not dim all the way to off, or even near it!

reviews.text: It's not the function of the switches, it's the design that's a problem. I have a 7 year old, and she complains that the "slider" dial to adjust the dimmer, is just too sharp when she touches the lights. I thought she was being dramatic, but the other night when I was going into the kitchen, I touched the light switch in the wrong place and it actually felt sharp. These switches aren't bad, they work just fine and are easy to install. But there are better designed dimmers out there.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2025
reviews.title: It's not the function of the switches, it's the design that's a problem.

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 2 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, Universal Lighting Control, Single Pole or 3 Way, Compatible with LED Dimmable Lamp, CFL, Incandescent, Halogen Bulb, Decorator Wallplate Included, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: Ordered a 2-pack, received a 10-pack! Switches are great, I love the adjustment knob to control the min brightness, the fact it's in front rather than behind the unit makes it super easy to adjust the light. The adjustments worked perfectly. No flicker at all on the lights. The actual dimmer works great too, I feel like it gets stuck slightly on it's min position when trying to crank it back up though. eels great quality overall, and also includes a faceplate as well as the plastic tie off caps. Btw, If you do notice a flicker, it's most likely your bulbs.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2025
reviews.title: Great quality, will buy again

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 2 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, Universal Lighting Control, Single Pole or 3 Way, Compatible with LED Dimmable Lamp, CFL, Incandescent, Halogen Bulb, Decorator Wallplate Included, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: These dimmer switches are exactly what I needed to upgrade the ambiance in our home. The 2-pack was a great value, and installation was quick—even for someone who isn’t an electrician. The dimming range is smooth with no flickering, and it works perfectly with both LED and incandescent bulbs. I love the sleek, low-profile design—it looks clean and modern on the wall. Whether you want bright task lighting or a cozy evening vibe, these dimmers do the job. Highly recommend for anyone looking to add style and control to their lighting!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2025
reviews.title: Perfect Upgrade for Modern Lighting

reviews.text: We decided to spruce up our bathroom with new fixtures but didn't realize how much brighter they would be. These little guys came to the rescue. reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN 2 Pack Dimmer Light Switch, Universal Lighting Control, Single Pole or 3 Way, Compatible with LED Dimmable Lamp, CFL, Incandescent, Halogen Bulb, Decorator Wallplate Included, UL Listed, White
reviews.text: Basic dimmer switch with CFL or LED capabilities. The dimmer offers easy tree or four wire install for 3-way or single pole install. The dimmer itself is easy to wire and does work with dimmable LED bulbs. The only issue I encountered after the install of the first dimmer was that the plastic finish of the switch paddle and the switch plate cover is that if you are not very careful the finish will very easily scratch and/or discolor. After my install which I have done about 2500 in my life so far there were what appeared to be hairline dark marks on the paddle and the wall plate. The marks were so small but noticeable since the switch was white colored. I used a paper towel with some cleaner and rubbed the marks which did fad but if this happens while just doing the install and I was wearing Nitrile Disposable Gloves then I wonder how it will hold up under everyday use. I deducted a star due to the lack of quality to the switch plastic used!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2025
reviews.title: Basic dimmer with CFL or LED capabilities BUT below average for quality of plastic finish of switch!

reviews.text: This single pole or three way dimmer switch is simple to install and versatile. The instructions are clear and easy to understand. The dimmer controls light level and does not give the flickering or buzzing that older dimmers suffered. The color is as expected, bright white. The product feels light it is constructed with some durability and will fit your Decor receptacles. A friendly reminder: always take a picture of the existing wiring before you unwire it. Having this reference can save you a time and mental effort if you're a DIYer.
